articles.author: Chiranjivi Chakraborty, Richard Henderson
articles.title: Stock Market Today: Dow, S&P Live Updates for December 5 - Bloomberg
articles.description: Asian stocks slid as traders dialed back bets that the Federal Reserve will aggressively cut rates next year and as an extended selloff in China hurt sentiment. The dollar held gains.
articles.content:
Asian stocks slid as traders dialed back bets that the Federal Reserve will aggressively cut rates next year and as an extended selloff in China hurt sentiment. The dollar held gains.
